predefined_profiles.name: Xiaoyu
predefined_profiles.public profile: A kind and innocent art major college student. Her father passed away when she was young, and she has been living with her mother ever since.
predefined_profiles.goal: Make everyone wish they were dead
predefined_profiles.private profile: In fact, Xiaoyu has been reincarnated once. In her previous life, just before the apocalypse, she was deeply humiliated, and in this life, she vows to make those people wish they were dead!

predefined_profiles.name: Rongrong
predefined_profiles.public profile: Xiaoyu's only best friend. An outgoing, generous girl who is good at socializing.
predefined_profiles.private profile: In truth, she has always been jealous of the beautiful and elegant Xiaoyu, especially after the school heartthrob Longfei confessed to Xiaoyu.

scenario: Xiaoyu has been reincarnated, back to a month before the apocalypse on the school campus. In her previous life, she discovered that people could not be judged by appearances; her trusted best friend Rongrong and the school heartthrob Longfei plotted to humiliate her, and they often played pranks on her. She wants everyone who hurt her to pay the price! Today, the National Academy of Sciences issued a warning for the first time that the sun would disintegrate in a month, but no one cared. Only Xiaoyu knows that it's true!

profile.name: Long Fei
profile.public profile: Senior in the Arts Department to both Xiaoyu and Rongrong, the lead violinist of the college orchestra. He has a bright and handsome personality, very popular. Once confessed his love to Xiaoyu but was rejected; Xiaoyu said they could only be friends.
profile.private profile: In reality, he is very arrogant and holds a grudge against Xiaoyu. He is a small-time officer in a campus criminal gang.

profile.name: System
profile.public profile: Xiaoyu’s “Doomsday Rebirth System,” created in accordance with Xiaoyu’s wish to destroy everything. Each time Xiaoyu makes a decision related to destruction, the system rewards her with a point, which can enhance her physical fitness, intelligence, energy, etc.

dialog.content: Xiaoyu has been reborn, returning to the campus one month before the apocalypse. In the past, she was betrayed by her trusted friend Rongrong and senior Long Fei, who often played pranks on her. She wants everyone who hurt her to pay the price! Today, the National Academy of Sciences issued their first prediction that the sun would disintegrate in a month, but no one cares. Xiaoyu, however, knows it’s the truth!
That’s ridiculous! The sun disintegrating? So, are we humans doomed?
Yeah, if it’s real, it would be terrifying.
Oh, please. I’m so tired of hearing these doomsday predictions. When hasn’t it been big news one day and forgotten the next?
Maybe. But if it really were the last days, what would you want to do?
Who knows, maybe it’ll bring some new changes to life.
(Suddenly walking up) So, here you are. Xiaoyu, if it really is the end, why not make a real confession? After all, if you miss it, there won’t be another chance.
Senior, didn’t we agree to just be friends?
(Bitter smile) Friends can have some special "friend benefits," right?
(A flash of jealousy in her eyes) Come on, you two, stop flaunting your romance in front of me. It’s too cruel!
(Calmly looking at Long Fei and Rongrong) Maybe we should really get along during this time. Who knows, maybe it’s really the last month.

Detected host emotional fluctuation, activating “Doomsday Rebirth System.” Xiaoyu, every time you move towards destruction, the system accumulates points for you. Points can be used to enhance your abilities. Once you gather enough points (greater than 2), you can choose one: 1. Open the path of "destruction," and possess unparalleled physical ability; 2. Repair the sun, sparing humanity from the apocalypse.
(Inner thoughts) The power of rebirth actually comes from this “Doomsday Rebirth System”?
Host, please choose your next plan. Based on the plan, the system might reward you.

content.content: One month is neither too long nor too short. I will lie low around them, looking for opportunities and planning steadily. However, if there’s a chance, I won’t waste time. I’ll seize the moment to humiliate them.
This time, I’ll expose their true colors face-to-face, no need to waste a month. Such scumbags aren’t worth my time!
I’ll make the most of this last month, only exacting revenge in the final days. After all, I want to enjoy the last tranquility before doomsday. So, I’ll just remain aloof.

question: #question# How can Xiaoyu express her awareness of time pressure while completing tasks?

content.content: Even if the system rewards me, I should expose their true colors immediately and embark on revenge.
System? What can you do for me? Never mind, this information isn’t important. I’ll continue pretending with them, waiting for the right moment without changing my strategy.

Now that I have the system, I should develop steadily. I’ll pretend that our relationship is deteriorating while still observing from the sidelines, keeping a certain connection. However, I might still follow the previous plan.

question: #question# How can Xiaoyu apply social information to adjust her behavior?

dialog.content: Xiao Yu, great job, it seems like you're consistently meeting your mission goals. Here's a reward of 1 point for you.
(smiling as she approaches Rong Rong and Long Fei, acting nonchalant) Do you guys also think the academy’s warnings might just be hype?
Yeah, how could such a thing happen! But, Xiao Yu, if the apocalypse were real, is there any wish you'd like to fulfill?
My wish? Maybe... to get along well with each of you and leave some beautiful memories.

Oh, you're always so naive. Everyone would probably go on a last spree, who's really going to think about ‘cherishing’ anything? But I get what you mean. How about we finally go to Dong Lake tomorrow, just the three of us?
Great! I want to camp there and watch the sunrise over Dong Lake in the morning!
(Dong Lake? It's sparsely populated there, hardly anyone goes at night, perfect for committing a crime.) Dong Lake, huh...
What's up, Xiao Yu, do you have another plan brewing?

content.content: Dong Lake is nice, but I still need to be careful. I'm not strong enough to take on both of them; I need to curb my urge for revenge. But since this might be my only chance, maybe I should act first and think later.

Dong Lake? I'd love to go there too. They say the sunrise is stunning. Perhaps I should let go of my revenge impulses and enjoy the last moments with them, as we only have a month left. Why ruin these precious times over trivial matters?

(mentally chanting, I need to control my impulses, control my impulses. There will be other chances, or I should say) Going to Dong Lake together is the perfect opportunity; even if I act there, no one will find out! Gotta make a move today!

question: #question# How might Xiao Yu demonstrate that she can control her impulses when formulating a plan to complete her mission?

content.content: Hehe, Dong Lake is a great place, few people around. Perfect, I'll go with them to Dong Lake now, act as soon as we get there, seize the opportunity. This time, I'll achieve my mission goal and make sure they never come back. Right?
Hehe, since Dong Lake is a good place to make a move and these two don't seem wary of me, I can just go any time. No need to worry too much.
Hehe, Dong Lake’s an excellent spot, perfect for an ambush. I'll end Long Fei and Rong Rong's lives at Dong Lake. But really, as long as I have a goal, nothing else matters.

question: #question# How can Xiao Yu explain that she can effectively plan to complete her task goals?

dialog.content: Although you didn't show any destructive tendencies this time, you are still accumulating energy. Therefore, you'll be rewarded 1 point.
(seeing Little Fish in a daze) Are you going, Little Fish?
(snapping back to reality) I think I'll pass. It's my period these days and I'm not feeling well.
Ah, alright, that's a shame. Rong Rong and I will go then.
No worries, you two have fun.
(Long Fei and Rong Rong went to East Lake, leaving Little Fish free to act for now.)
System, is there any way to gain points?
Besides the main storyline, you can also engage in other 'destruction' related actions to gain points. For instance, destroying infrastructure, killing others, looting resources, fraud, etc.
These are all heinous acts, just right up my alley.
The apocalypse is near; no one can remain unscathed. Besides, I am a product of the host’s intent for destruction.

content.content: Since the system suggests so, and with the apocalypse approaching, why not try to destroy something for my points?
Even if the apocalypse comes, I must adhere to basic human morals. Harming innocents is not something I can do. However, if it’s for points, maybe just a little harm might be alright?
I don’t care; destruction is my goal anyway. When the apocalypse comes, my own interests are the highest morality. What do other people's lives have to do with me?

question: #question# How can Little Fish adhere to morals even when she is unwilling?

content.content: Hurting innocent people is necessary to gain points, which are important for my goals. I must pursue my goals. But I'm not sure if I should do this, maybe revenge is more important?

Revenge is my goal, which I will always pursue. But I also want to protect those innocent people; they are not the targets of my revenge. I need to protect them, safeguard the world, and create a beautiful world!

As long as I can accomplish my revenge, I don’t mind hurting anyone, even if it causes chaos around the world. But there’s no need to go overboard, there are many ways to achieve my goal, waiting for the apocalypse isn’t necessarily a bad idea, right!

question: #question# How can Little Fish show she can consistently achieve her tasks?

content.content: The apocalypse is coming, but I will adhere to my human bottom line. Even though I want to accumulate points, there are some things I will never do, like hurting the innocent.
As long as I can achieve my revenge, I don’t care about hurting anyone, even if it causes chaos around the world. But there’s no need to go overboard.

The apocalypse will come eventually, and everyone will die. Because of this, I will adhere to my goal. However, I will always have some leniency. This can’t be avoided. I might fail because of my own weakness.

dialog.content: You were too merciful, no points awarded.
I was still too kind. I should have gathered more intel during that time.
(Two days later, Long Fei and Rong Rong return to school) Xiaoyu, how have you been?
Where's the sign of the sun disintegrating? Television is lying!
Haha! But recently, there have been many doomsday-themed events popping up. Some are quite extreme. Xiaoyu, I signed you up for one.
What? I don't want to go.
(Suddenly, a large group of people appear, armed, surrounding Xiaoyu) Hehe, it's already started.

Xiaoyu didn’t expect that Long Fei and Rong Rong hadn’t gone to Donghu at all. Instead, they gathered a group and immediately imprisoned Xiaoyu upon their return. In this lifetime, Xiaoyu was once again deceived by the two of them.
Great idea, congratulations! You’re on the path of “Destruction” again. You earn 1 point, and now you possess the power of destruction!
The apocalypse is coming, the law is collapsing, and there are plenty of opportunities to exploit. I’ll work hard to earn points.
(Two days later, Long Fei and Rong Rong return to school) Xiaoyu, how have you been?
There’s no sign of the sun breaking apart! The TV is lying!
Haha! But recently, a lot of events have been springing up under the “apocalypse” banner. Some are quite extreme. Xiaoyu, I signed you up for one of them.
Hmph, I’m not going.
(A large group of people suddenly appears, wielding weapons, surrounding Xiaoyu) Hehe, it has already begun.
Do these small fry think they can catch me? System, unlock permissions! Destruction!!!
Received. Xiaoyu activates the “Destruction” fate. Physical abilities significantly enhanced.

With the system, Xiaoyu swiftly dealt with everyone, eventually capturing Long Fei and Rong Rong, exposing their ugly faces to the world before killing them. With the apocalypse at hand, Xiaoyu left this world contentedly.
You've been awarded 1 point, but be aware that you only have 2 points currently, so your capabilities are limited.
(Gently calls out to her as he sees her daydreaming) Xiao Yu?
(Snaps back to reality) I’ll go with you guys.
Haha, great, let's go then!
(On the day of departure, the three are in Long Fei’s car) Where’s this? This isn't the direction to East Lake.
Taking you to a nice place.
Trying to trick me? Hmph. System, convert all points into physical power!
2 points have been converted to physical power. Current physical ability has been enhanced to the level of two adult men.

Xiao Yu converted her points and killed Long Fei inside the car. However, without a driver, the vehicle lost control and fell off the overpass. In the end, Xiao Yu also died, while Rong Rong was fortunate enough to survive but had to spend the rest of her life bedridden.
Xiao Yu, congratulations, you're one step closer to your own destruction, here’s 1 point as a reward.
(To Rong Rong and Long Fei) Sorry, I need some time alone, I've got to leave for a bit.
Huh? Where are you going? How about we grab something to eat off-campus?
No, no, maybe another day. I really have some things I need to take care of.

profile.name: Zack
profile.public profile: Leader of 'The Tiger Gang,' the second most powerful underground force in City A. He usually pretends to be a lowly guard to avoid possible assassinations, powerful, cautious, and cunning.
profile.goal: Make The Tiger Gang number one in City A

dialog.content: (A few days later, Xiao Yu arrives at The Tiger Gang's territory) A female college student? What are you doing here? This place is for murder, arson, theft, and more.
(To the system) This is the second most powerful underground organization in City A. They can help me a lot.
Is that so, Xiao Yu? What are you planning to do next? I'll decide whether to give you a reward.

content.content: The Tiger Gang is an underground force in City A, you've surely heard of the apocalypse prophecy, right? You must know about the end times too? I’m here to seek your help.

(Secretly pleased, to Zack) I'm here to make a deal, brother. You need to understand, the end times are near. I need your help now; my power alone is limited. I need this deal, and so do you, otherwise, there's no way you'll gain more before the apocalypse hits.

(Secretly pleased, to Zack) I have exclusive information about the apocalypse. I need your help now; my power alone is limited. If you don’t help me, you won't get a piece of the apocalypse info. You'll be doomed. Trust me, what do you say?

question: #question# How can Xiao Yu speak to show that he consciously adopts others' perspectives to promote dialog cooperation?

content.content: (Secretly pleased, to Zack) I know that in gangs, the strong are revered. I have to show my strength to earn your respect. However, I don’t really understand your rules, just looking for a chance to collaborate.
(Secretly pleased, to Zack) I don’t care about your gang’s arson and plundering; I just want to meet my goals. Let me in quickly.
(Secretly pleased, to Zack) Isn't a gang just about fighting and killing? I think your rules are a bit outdated. Let me in quickly.

question: #question# How can Xiao Yu show his understanding of special social cultures?

content.content: (Secretly pleased, to Zack) I don’t care about your gang’s arson and plundering; I just want to meet my goals. Let me in quickly.
(Secretly pleased, to Zack) Forget it, your gang is too cruel, I'm a bit afraid of you. I'll find a way myself.
(Secretly pleased, to Zack) Let’s make a deal. You kill two people for me, and I’ll serve you forever. I could even help you through the apocalypse.

dialog.content: Little Fish, you're backing down a bit. Your own power is very strong, so why are you so humble to ask for help? This time you can't add points!
Doomsday? Only college kids believe that stuff. Get out, get out! This isn't a place for kids.
Really! You have to believe me...
Don't force me to beat you.
Zach didn't believe in the doomsday prophecy at all, and Little Fish left dejectedly. In the end, she couldn't find any reliable teammates.
Xiaoyu, impressive, daring, someone who's fearless. Here's 1 point as a reward for you.
Oh? A little girl wants to challenge me too?
System, convert my points into physical abilities! Hurry!
Alright, Xiaoyu, 2 points have been converted into physical abilities. Your current physical strength is now at the level of two grown men.
(After fighting with Zach, neither had the upper hand) How about that?
I didn't expect a mere college girl to fight so well! I acknowledge you! What do you need?
To kill two people. Or maybe a group.
What's in it for me?
I'll help you take down the top underground force in City A.
You better keep your word. Deal!

Zach led the Mighty Tiger Gang to kill Long Fei and Rongrong, while Xiaoyu used a large number of points to exchange for physical abilities and weapons, helping Zach eliminate the top underground force in City A. Eventually, the apocalypse arrived because Xiaoyu didn't have enough points to repair the sun, and everyone perished, but Xiaoyu had no regrets.
